FuncDef: This command creates a Lawful Interception (LI) IPv6 filter list, or enters the CLI context for a LI IPv6 filter list.   LI IPv6 filters are used as a manner to create confidential IPv6 filter based li-source entries.   The LI IPv6 filter entries are inserted/merged into normal IPv6 filters as configured via the li-filter-associations and li-filter-block-reservation commands, but the LI IPv6 filter entries are not visible to users without LI permissions.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the IPv6 address filter. Filter names cannot start with an underscore character (for example, "_my-filter") and cannot use the name "default".
